037/**
038 * Various console utility functions
039 */
040public final class PaxtoolsMain {
041        final static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PaxtoolsMain.class);
042
043        private static SimpleIOHandler io;
044
045        private PaxtoolsMain() {
046                throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Non-instantiable utility class.");
047        }
048
049        static {
050                io = new SimpleIOHandler();
051                io.mergeDuplicates(true);
052        }
053
054        /*
055         * using arguments:
056         * <input> <output> <db> [-crossSpecies] [-subPathways] [-notPathway] [organisms=9606,mouse,10090,rat,human,..]
057         *
058         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
059         */
060        public static void toGSEA(String[] argv) throws IOException {
061                //argv[0] is the command name ('toGsea')
062                boolean crossSpecies = false; //cross-check is enabled (i.e., no mixing different species IDs in one row)
063                boolean subPathways = false; //no sub-pathways (i.e., going into sub-pathways is not enabled)
064                boolean notPathways = false;
065                Set<String> organisms = new HashSet<String>();
066
067                if (argv.length < 4)
068                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not enough arguments: " + argv);
069
070                if (argv.length > 4) {
071                        for (int i = 4; i < argv.length; i++) {
072                                if("-crossSpecies".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
073                                        crossSpecies = true;
074                                }
075                                else if("-subPathways".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
076                                        subPathways = true;
077                                }
078                                else if("-notPathway".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
079                                        notPathways = true;
080                                }
081                                else if(argv[i].startsWith("organisms=")) {
082                                        for(String o : argv[i].substring(10).split(",")) {
083                                                organisms.add(o.trim().toLowerCase());
084                                        }
085                                }
086                        }
087                }
088
089                // The Constructor args: GSEAConverter(idTypeNameOrPrefix, crossSpeciesCheckEnabled?, skipSubPathways?)
090                GSEAConverter gseaConverter = new GSEAConverter(argv[3], !crossSpecies, !subPathways);
091                gseaConverter.setSkipOutsidePathways(!notPathways);
092                gseaConverter.setAllowedOrganisms(organisms);//if organisms is empty then all species are allowed (no filtering)
093                gseaConverter.writeToGSEA(io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(argv[1])), new FileOutputStream(argv[2]));
094        }
095
096        /*
097         *
098         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
099         *
100         * @param argv
101         * @throws IOException
102         */
103        public static void getNeighbors(String[] argv) throws IOException
104        {
105                // set strings vars
106                String in = argv[1];
107                String[] ids = argv[2].split(",");
108                String out = argv[3];
109
110                // read BioPAX from the file
111                Model model = io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(in));
112
113                // get elements (entities)
114                Set<BioPAXElement> elements = new HashSet<BioPAXElement>();
115                for (Object id : ids) {
116                        BioPAXElement e = model.getByID(id.toString());
117                        if (e != null && (e instanceof Entity || e instanceof entity)) {
118                                elements.add(e);
119                        } else {
120                                log.warn("Source element not found: " + id);
121                        }
122                }
123
124                // execute the 'nearest neighborhood' query
125                Set<BioPAXElement> result = QueryExecuter
126                        .runNeighborhood(elements, model, 1, Direction.BOTHSTREAM);
127
128                // auto-complete/clone the results in a new model
129                // (this also cuts some less important edges, right?..)
130                Completer c = new Completer(io.getEditorMap());
131                result = c.complete(result, model);
132                Cloner cln = new Cloner(io.getEditorMap(), io.getFactory());
133                model = cln.clone(model, result); // new sub-model
134
135                if (model != null) {
136                        log.info("Elements in the result model: " + model.getObjects().size());
137                        // export to OWL
138                        io.convertToOWL(model, new FileOutputStream(out));
139                } else {
140                        log.error("NULL model returned.");
141                }
142        }
143
144        /*
145         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
146         * @param argv
147         * @throws IOException
148         */
149        public static void fetch(String[] argv) throws IOException {
150                // set strings vars
151                String in = argv[1];
152                String out = argv[2];
153                String[] uris = new String[0]; //empty means - all
154                boolean absoluteUris = false;
155                if(argv.length > 3) {
156                        for(int i=3; i<argv.length; i++) {
157                                String param = argv[i];
158                                if (param.startsWith("uris=")) {
159                                        uris = param.substring(5).split(",");
160                                }
161                                else if(param.startsWith("-absolute")) {
162                                        absoluteUris = true;
163                                }
164                        }
165                }
166
167                // import the model
168                log.info("Loading the BioPAX model from " + in);
169                Model model = io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(in));
170                log.info("Successfully loaded the BioPAX model. Writing to the output: " + out);
171
172                // extract and save the (sub-)model
173                SimpleIOHandler biopaxWriter = new SimpleIOHandler(model.getLevel());
174                biopaxWriter.absoluteUris(absoluteUris);
175                if(uris.length > 0)
176                        biopaxWriter.convertToOWL(model, new FileOutputStream(out), uris);
177                else
178                        biopaxWriter.convertToOWL(model, new FileOutputStream(out));
179
180                log.info("Done.");
181        }
182
183
184        /*
185         * Detects and converts a BioPAX Level 1, 2,
186         * or PSI-MI/MITAB model to BioPAX Level3..
187         *
188         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
189         */
190        public static void toLevel3(String[] argv) throws IOException {
191                final String input = argv[1];
192                final String output = argv[2];
193
194                boolean forcePsiInteractionToComplex = false;
195                if(argv.length > 3) {
196                        for(int i=3; i<argv.length; i++) {
197                                String param = argv[i];
198                                if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-psimiToComplexes")) {
199                                        forcePsiInteractionToComplex = true;
200                                }
201                        }
202                }
203
204                Type type = detect(input);
205
206                InputStream is = getInputStream(input);
207                FileOutputStream os = new FileOutputStream(output);
208
209                try {
210                        switch (type) {
211                                case BIOPAX:
212                                        Model model = io.convertFromOWL(is);
213                                        model = (new LevelUpgrader()).filter(model);
214                                        if (model != null) {
215                                                io.setFactory(model.getLevel().getDefaultFactory());
216                                                io.convertToOWL(model, os); //os is closed already
217                                        }
218                                        break;
219
220                                case PSIMI:
221                                        PsiToBiopax3Converter psimiConverter = new PsiToBiopax3Converter();
222                                        psimiConverter.convert(is, os, forcePsiInteractionToComplex);
223                                        os.close();
224                                        break;
225
226                                default: //MITAB
227                                        psimiConverter = new PsiToBiopax3Converter();
228                                        psimiConverter.convertTab(is, os, forcePsiInteractionToComplex);
229                                        os.close();
230                                        break;
231                        }
232
233                } catch (Exception e) {
234                        throw new RuntimeException("Failed to convert " +
235                                input + "to BioPAX L3", e);
236                }
237        }
238
239        private enum Type {
240                BIOPAX,
241                PSIMI,
242                PSIMITAB
243        }
244
245        //read a few lines to detect it's a BioPAX vs. PSI-MI vs. PSI-MITAB data.
246        private static Type detect(String input) {
247                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
248                try {
249                        BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(getInputStream(input)));
250                        int linesToCheck = 20;
251                        while (linesToCheck-- > 0) {
252                                sb.append(reader.readLine()).append('\n');
253                        }
254                        reader.close();
255                } catch (IOException e) {
256                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
257                }
258
259                String buf = sb.toString();
260                if (buf.contains("<rdf:RDF") && buf.contains("http://www.biopax.org/release/biopax")) {
261                        return Type.BIOPAX;
262                }
263                else if (buf.contains("<entrySet") && buf.contains("/psidev")) {
264                        return Type.PSIMI;
265                }
266                else
267                        return Type.PSIMITAB; //default/guess
268        }
269
270        /*
271         *  Converts a BioPAX file to SBGN and saves it in a file.
272         *
273         *  TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
274         */
275        public static void toSbgn(String[] argv) throws IOException {
276                String input = argv[1];
277                String output = argv[2];
278                Model model = io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(input));
279                boolean doLayout = true;
280                if(argv.length > 3) {
281                        for(int i=3; i<argv.length; i++) {
282                                String param = argv[i];
283                                if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-nolayout")) {
284                                        doLayout = false;
285                                        break;
286                                }
287                        }
288                }
289
290                //use blacklist.txt file if exists
291                Blacklist blackList = null;
292                File blacklistFile = new File("blacklist.txt");
293                if(blacklistFile.exists()) {
294                        log.info("toSBGN: using blacklist.txt from current directory");
295                        blackList = new Blacklist(new FileInputStream(blacklistFile));
296                } else {
297                        log.info("toSBGN: not blacklisting any ubiquitous molecules (no blacklist.txt found)");
298                }
299
300                final UbiqueDetector ubd = (blackList != null) ? new ListUbiqueDetector(blackList.getListed()) : null;
301                L3ToSBGNPDConverter l3ToSBGNPDConverter = new L3ToSBGNPDConverter(ubd, null, doLayout);
302                l3ToSBGNPDConverter.writeSBGN(model, output);
303        }
304
305
306        /*
307         * Checks files by the online BioPAX validator using the built-in BioPAX validator client.
308         *
309         * See about <a href="http://www.biopax.org/validator">BioPAX Validator Webservice</a>
310         *
311         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
312         */
313        public static void validate(String[] argv) throws IOException
314        {
315                String input = argv[1];
316                String output = argv[2];
317                // default options
318                RetFormat outf = RetFormat.HTML;
319                boolean fix = false;
320                Integer maxErrs = null;
321                Behavior level = null; //will report both errors and warnings
322                String profile = null;
323
324                // match optional args
325                for (int i = 3; i < argv.length; i++) {
326                        if ("html".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
327                                outf = RetFormat.HTML;
328                        } else if ("xml".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
329                                outf = RetFormat.XML;
330                        } else if ("biopax".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
331                                outf = RetFormat.OWL;
332                        } else if ("auto-fix".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
333                                fix = true;
334                        } else if ("only-errors".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
335                                level = Behavior.ERROR;
336                        } else if ((argv[i]).toLowerCase().startsWith("maxerrors=")) {
337                                String num = argv[i].substring(10);
338                                maxErrs = Integer.valueOf(num);
339                        } else if ("notstrict".equalsIgnoreCase(argv[i])) {
340                                profile = "notstrict";
341                        }
342                }
343
344                Collection<File> files = new HashSet<File>();
345                File fileOrDir = new File(input);
346                if (!fileOrDir.canRead()) {
347                        System.out.println("Cannot read " + input);
348                }
349
350                // collect files
351                if (fileOrDir.isDirectory()) {
352                        // validate all the OWL files in the folder
353                        FilenameFilter filter = new FilenameFilter() {
354                                public boolean accept(File dir, String name) {
355                                        return (name.endsWith(".owl"));
356                                }
357                        };
358                        for (String s : fileOrDir.list(filter)) {
359                                files.add(new File(fileOrDir.getCanonicalPath()
360                                        + File.separator + s));
361                        }
362                } else {
363                        files.add(fileOrDir);
364                }
365
366                // upload and validate using the default URL:
367                // http://www.biopax.org/biopax-validator/check.html
368                OutputStream os = new FileOutputStream(output);
369                try {
370                        if (!files.isEmpty()) {
371                                BiopaxValidatorClient val = new BiopaxValidatorClient();
372                                val.validate(fix, profile, outf, level, maxErrs, null, files.toArray(new File[]{}), os);
373                        }
374                } catch (Exception ex) {
375                        // fall-back: not using the remote validator; trying to read files
376                        String msg = "Unable to check with the biopax-validator web service: \n " +
377                                ex.toString() +
378                                "\n Fall-back: trying to parse the file(s) with paxtools " +
379                                "(up to the first syntax error in each file)...\n";
380                        log.error(msg, ex);
381                        os.write(msg.getBytes());
382
383                        for (File f : files) {
384                                try {
385                                        Model m = io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(f.getPath()));
386                                        msg = "Model that contains "
387                                                + m.getObjects().size()
388                                                + " elements is successfully created from "
389                                                + f.getPath()
390                                                + " (check the console output for warnings).\n";
391                                        os.write(msg.getBytes());
392                                } catch (Exception e) {
393                                        msg = "Error: " + e +
394                                                " in building a BioPAX Model from: " +
395                                                f.getPath() + "\n";
396                                        os.write(msg.getBytes());
397                                        e.printStackTrace();
398                                        log.error(msg);
399                                }
400                                os.flush();
401                        }
402                }
403        }
404
405        /*
406         * Exports a biopax model to SIF or/and customizable ExtendedSIF format
407         * (default classic SIF has only 3 data columns; ExtendedSIF and customized
408         * can have more colums plus nodes description at the bottom, after a blank line).
409         *
410         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
411         */
412        public static void toSifnx(String[] argv) throws IOException {
413                boolean extended = false; //if it stays 'false', then andSif==true will be in effect automatically
414                boolean andSif = false; //if extended==false, SIF will be generated as it would be andSif==true
415                boolean mergeInteractions = true;
416                boolean useNameIfNoId = false;
417                final Collection<SIFEnum> include = new HashSet<SIFEnum>();
418                final Collection<SIFEnum> exclude = new HashSet<SIFEnum>();
419                final ConfigurableIDFetcher idFetcher = new ConfigurableIDFetcher();
420                final List<String> customFieldList = new ArrayList<String>(); //there may be custom field names (SIF mediators)
421                //process arguments
422                if(argv.length > 3) {
423                        for(int i=3; i<argv.length; i++) {
424                                String param = argv[i];
425                                if (param.startsWith("seqDb=")) {
426                                        //remove the 'seqDb=' and split comma-sep. values (a single val. no comma is gonna be fine too)
427                                        for (String db : param.substring(6).split(","))
428                                                idFetcher.seqDbStartsWithOrEquals(db);
429                                } else if (param.startsWith("chemDb=")) {
430                                        for (String db : param.substring(7).split(","))
431                                                idFetcher.chemDbStartsWithOrEquals(db);
432                                } else if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-andSif")) {
433                                        andSif = true;
434                                } else if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-extended")) {
435                                        extended = true;
436                                } else if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-dontMergeInteractions")) {
437                                        mergeInteractions = false;
438                                } else if (param.equalsIgnoreCase("-useNameIfNoId")) {
439                                        useNameIfNoId = true;
440                                } else if (param.startsWith("include=")) {
441                                        for (String t : param.substring(8).split(","))
442                                                include.add(SIFEnum.valueOf(t.toUpperCase()));
443                                } else if (param.startsWith("exclude=")) {
444                                        for (String t : param.substring(8).split(","))
445                                                exclude.add(SIFEnum.valueOf(t.toUpperCase())); //e.g. NEIGHBOR_OF
446                                } else {
447                                        OutputColumn.Type type = OutputColumn.Type.getType(param.toUpperCase());
448                                        if ((type != null && type != OutputColumn.Type.CUSTOM) || param.contains("/"))
449                                        {
450                                                if(!param.contains("/"))
451                                                        customFieldList.add(param.toUpperCase());
452                                                else
453                                                        customFieldList.add(param);
454                                        }
455                                }
456                        }
457                }
458
459                //fall back to defaults when no ID types were provided
460                if(idFetcher.getChemDbStartsWithOrEquals().isEmpty()) {
461                        idFetcher.chemDbStartsWithOrEquals("chebi");
462                }
463                if(idFetcher.getSeqDbStartsWithOrEquals().isEmpty()) {
464                        idFetcher.chemDbStartsWithOrEquals("hgnc");
465                }
466                idFetcher.useNameWhenNoDbMatch(useNameIfNoId);
467
468                Model model = getModel(io, argv[1]);
469
470                if(mergeInteractions)
471                        ModelUtils.mergeEquivalentInteractions(model);
472
473                //Create a new SIF searcher:
474                //set SIF miners to use (default is to use all types, given no include/exclude args provided)
475                final Collection<SIFEnum> sifTypes = (include.isEmpty())
476                        ? new HashSet<SIFEnum>(Arrays.asList(SIFEnum.values())) : include;
477                for(SIFType t : exclude) {
478                        sifTypes.remove(t); //remove if exists, otherwise - ignore
479                }
480                SIFSearcher searcher = new SIFSearcher(idFetcher, sifTypes.toArray(new SIFEnum[]{}));
481                log.info("toSIF: using SIFTypes: " + sifTypes);
482                //load and set blacklist.txt file if exists
483                File blacklistFile = new File("blacklist.txt");
484                if(blacklistFile.exists()) {
485                        log.info("toSIF: using blacklist.txt from current directory");
486                        searcher.setBlacklist(new Blacklist(new FileInputStream(blacklistFile)));
487                } else {
488                        log.info("toSIF: not blacklisting ubiquitous molecules (no blacklist.txt found)");
489                }
490
491                File outputFile = new File(argv[2]);
492                OutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(outputFile);
493
494                if (extended) {
495                        //using built-in PC EXTENDED_BINARY_SIF format (customFieldList parameter is ignored)
496                        Set<SIFInteraction> binaryInts = searcher.searchSIF(model);
497                        ExtendedSIFWriter.write(binaryInts, outputStream);
498                } else if (customFieldList.isEmpty()) {
499                        searcher.searchSIF(model, outputStream); //classic SIF
500                } else {
501                        // not really SIF format (this is useful but extra columns sometimes cannot be parsed correctly, by e.g. Cytoscape)
502                        log.info("toSIF: using custom fields (extra columns): " + customFieldList);
503                        searcher.searchSIF(model, outputStream, new CustomFormat(customFieldList.toArray(new String[]{})));
504                }
505                //outputStream is closed at this point (inside searchSIF(..) or write(..) method)
506
507                if(extended && andSif) {
508                        //convert the file into classic thee-column SIF format
509                        sifnxToSif(outputFile.getPath(), outputFile.getPath()+".sif");
510                }
511
512                log.info("toSIF: done.");
513        }
514
515        /*
516         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
517         */
518        public static void sifnxToSif(String inputFile, String outputFile) throws IOException {
519                BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(getInputStream(inputFile)));
520                OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(outputFile));
521                //skip the first line (headers)
522                if(reader.ready()) reader.readLine();
523                while(reader.ready()) {
524                        String line = reader.readLine();
525                        //stop at the first blank line (because next come nodes with attributes)
526                        if(line==null || line.isEmpty())
527                                break;
528                        //keep only the first three columns (otherwise, it's not gonna be SIF format)
529                        writer.write(StringUtils.join(Arrays.copyOfRange(line.split("\t", 4), 0, 3), '\t') + '\n');
530                }
531                reader.close();
532                writer.close();
533        }
534
535        /*
536         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
537         */
538        public static void integrate(String[] argv) throws IOException {
539
540                Model model1 = getModel(io, argv[1]);
541                Model model2 = getModel(io, argv[2]);
542
543                Integrator integrator = new Integrator(SimpleEditorMap.get(model1.getLevel()), model1, model2);
544                integrator.integrate();
545
546                io.setFactory(model1.getLevel().getDefaultFactory());
547                io.convertToOWL(model1, new FileOutputStream(argv[3]));
548        }
549
550        /*
551         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
552         */
553        public static void merge(String[] argv) throws IOException {
554
555                Model model1 = getModel(io, argv[1]);
556                Model model2 = getModel(io, argv[2]);
557
558                Merger merger = new Merger(SimpleEditorMap.get(model1.getLevel()));
559                merger.merge(model1, model2);
560
561                io.setFactory(model1.getLevel().getDefaultFactory());
562                io.convertToOWL(model1, new FileOutputStream(argv[3]));
563        }
564
565        /*
566         * Generates a blacklist file
567         * (to optionally use it to exclude ubiquitous small molecules,
568         * like ATP, when performing graph queries and exporting to
569         * SIF formats).
570         *
571         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
572         */
573        public static void blacklist(String[] argv) throws IOException {
574                Model model = getModel(io, argv[1]);
575                BlacklistGenerator3 gen = new BlacklistGenerator3();
576                Blacklist blacklist = gen.generateBlacklist(model);
577                blacklist.write(new FileOutputStream(argv[2]));
578        }

580        /*
581         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
582         */
583        public static void pattern(String[] argv) {
584                Dialog.main(argv);
585        }
586
587        private static Model getModel(BioPAXIOHandler io, String fName) throws IOException {
588                return io.convertFromOWL(getInputStream(fName));
589        }
590
591
592        /*
593         * TODO: should not be public API, but is already used from ext. apps, such as PaxtoolsR...
594         */
595        public static void summarize(String[] argv) throws IOException {
596                log.debug("Importing the input model from " + argv[1] + "...");
597                final Model model = getModel(io, argv[1]);
598                final PrintStream out = new PrintStream(argv[2]);
599                //run a specific or default analysis
600                if(argv.length>3) {
601                        for(int i=3; i < argv.length; i++) {
602                                if(argv[i].equals("--model")) {
603                                        summarize(model, out);
604                                } else if(argv[i].equals("--pathways")) {
605                                        summarizePathways(model, out);
606                                } else if(argv[i].equals("--hgnc-ids")) {
607                                        summarizeHgncIds(model, out);
608                                } else if(argv[i].equals("--uniprot-ids")) {
609                                        summarizeUniprotIds(model, out);
610                                } else if(argv[i].equals("--chebi-ids")) {
611                                        summarizeChebiIds(model, out);
612                                } else if(argv[i].equals("--uri-ids")) {
613                                        mapUriToIds(model, out);
614                                }
615                        }
616                } else {
617                        summarize(model, out);
618                }
619                out.close();
620        }
621
622
623        /*
624         * For each physical entity participant in the BioPAX model,
625         * output uri, type, names, standard identifiers (in JSON format).
626         */
627        private static void mapUriToIds(Model model, PrintStream out) {
628                Set<String> elements = new TreeSet<String>();
629
630                //write one by one to insert EOLs and make potentially a very large file human-readable -
631                for(PhysicalEntity pe : model.getObjects(PhysicalEntity.class))
632                {
633                        JSONObject jo = new JSONObject();
634                        jo.put("uri", pe.getUri());
635                        jo.put("type", pe.getModelInterface().getSimpleName());
636                        jo.put("generic", ModelUtils.isGeneric(pe));
637                        jo.put("label", pe.getDisplayName());
638
639                        JSONArray ja = new JSONArray();
640                        ja.addAll(pe.getName());
641                        jo.put("name", ja);
642
643                        if(!(pe instanceof SmallMolecule)) {
644                                ja = new JSONArray();
645                                ja.addAll(identifiers(pe, "hgnc symbol", false, false));
646                                jo.put("HGNC Symbol", ja);
647
648                                ja = new JSONArray();
649                                ja.addAll(identifiers(pe, "uniprot", true, false));
650                                jo.put("UniProt", ja);
651                        }
652
653                        if(pe instanceof SmallMolecule || PhysicalEntity.class.equals(pe.getModelInterface())) {
654                                ja = new JSONArray();
655                                ja.addAll(identifiers(pe, "chebi", false, false));
656                                jo.put("ChEBI", ja);
657                        }
658
659                        ja = new JSONArray();
660                        for(BioSource bs : ModelUtils.getOrganisms(pe)) ja.add(bs.getDisplayName());
661                        jo.put("organism", ja);
662
663                        ja = new JSONArray();
664                        for(Provenance ds : pe.getDataSource()) ja.add(ds.getDisplayName());
665                        jo.put("datasource", ja);
666
667                        elements.add(jo.toJSONString());
668                }
669
670                // Write as JSON array to the output
671                out.print("[\n" + StringUtils.join(elements,"\n,") + "\n]");
672        }
673
674
675        /**
676         * Recursively collects bio identifiers of given type (xref.db name)
677         * associated with the physical entity or generic, complex entity.
678         *
679         * TODO (options): process Gene and Interaction; traverse into 'evidence' property.
680         * @param entity a process participant (simple or generic)
681         * @param xrefdb identifier type, such as 'HGNC Symbol' or 'ChEBI' (matches Xref.db values in the BioPAX model)
682         * @param isPrefix whether the xrefdb value is a prefix rather than complete name.
683         * @param includeEvidence whether to traverse into property:evidence to collect ids.
684         */
685        private static Set<String> identifiers(final PhysicalEntity entity, final String xrefdb,
686                                                                                                                                                                 boolean isPrefix, boolean includeEvidence)
687        {
688                final Set<String> ids = new HashSet<String>();
689                final Fetcher fetcher = (includeEvidence)
690                        ? new Fetcher(SimpleEditorMap.L3, Fetcher.nextStepFilter)
691                        : new Fetcher(SimpleEditorMap.L3, Fetcher.nextStepFilter, Fetcher.evidenceFilter);
692                fetcher.setSkipSubPathways(true); //makes no difference now  but good to have/know...
693                Set<XReferrable> children = fetcher.fetch(entity, XReferrable.class);
694                children.add(entity); //include itself
695                for(XReferrable child : children) {//ignore some classes, such as controlled vocabularies, interactions, etc.
696                        if (child instanceof PhysicalEntity || child instanceof EntityReference || child instanceof Gene)
697                                for (Xref x : child.getXref())
698                                        if ((x.getId()!=null && x.getDb()!=null) && (isPrefix)
699                                                ? x.getDb().toLowerCase().startsWith(xrefdb.toLowerCase())
700                                                : xrefdb.equalsIgnoreCase(x.getDb()))
701                                        {
702                                                ids.add(x.getId());
703                                        }
704                }
705                return ids;
706        }
707
708
709        private static void summarizePathways(Model model, PrintStream out) throws IOException {
710                final PathAccessor directChildPathwaysAccessor = new PathAccessor("Pathway/pathwayComponent:Pathway");
711                final PathAccessor pathwayComponentAccessor = new PathAccessor("Pathway/pathwayComponent");
712                final PathAccessor pathwayOrderStepProcessAccessor = new PathAccessor("Pathway/pathwayOrder/stepProcess");
713
714                Set<Pathway> pathways = model.getObjects(Pathway.class);
715                //print column titles
716                out.println("PATHWAY_URI\tDISPLAY_NAME\tDIRECT_SUB_PATHWAY_URIS\tALL_SUB_PATHWAY_URIS");
717                for(Pathway pathway : pathways) {
718                        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
719                        //write URI and name
720                        sb.append(pathway.getUri()).append('\t').append(pathway.getDisplayName()).append('\t');
721                        //add direct sub-pathways
722                        for(Object o : directChildPathwaysAccessor.getValueFromBean(pathway)) {
723                                Pathway p = (Pathway) o;
724                                sb.append(p.getUri()).append(";");
725                        }
726                        sb.append("\t");
727                        //add all sub-pathways
728                        Fetcher fetcher = new Fetcher(SimpleEditorMap.L3, Fetcher.nextStepFilter);
729                        for(Pathway p : fetcher.fetch(pathway, Pathway.class)) {
730                                sb.append(p.getUri()).append(";");
731                        }
732                        out.println(sb.toString());
733                }
734                // print pathway names, etc. after a blank line and title line
735                out.println("\nPATHWAY_URI\tDATASOURCE\tDISPLAY_NAME\tALL_NAMES" +
736                        "\tNUM_DIRECT_COMPONENT_OR_STEP_PROCESSES");
737                for(Pathway pathway : pathways) {
738                        final int size = pathwayComponentAccessor.getValueFromBean(pathway).size()
739                                + pathwayOrderStepProcessAccessor.getValueFromBean(pathway).size();
740                        //pathways in PC2 normally has only one dataSource (Provenance)
741                        String datasource = pathway.getDataSource().iterator().next().getDisplayName();
742                        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
743                        sb.append(pathway.getUri()).append('\t')
744                                .append(datasource).append('\t')
745                                .append(pathway.getDisplayName()).append('\t');
746                        //all names
747                        for(String name : pathway.getName())
748                                sb.append('"').append(name).append('"').append(";");
749                        //"size"
750                        sb.append('\t').append(size);
751                        out.println(sb.toString());
752                }
753        }
754
755        private static void summarizeHgncIds(Model model, PrintStream out) {
756                boolean verbose = true; //TODO use another parameter here
757
758                //Analyse SERs (Protein-, Dna* and Rna* references) - HGNC usage, coverage,..
759                //Calc. the no. non-generic ERs having >1 different HGNC symbols and IDs, or none, etc.
760                Set<SequenceEntityReference> haveMultipleHgnc = new HashSet<SequenceEntityReference>();
761                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
762                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numProblematicErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
763                PathAccessor pa = new PathAccessor("EntityReference/entityReferenceOf/dataSource", model.getLevel());
764                Set<String> problemErs = new TreeSet<String>();
765                for(EntityReference ser : model.getObjects(EntityReference.class)) {
766                        //skip if it's a SMR or generic
767                        if(ser instanceof SmallMoleculeReference || !ser.getMemberEntityReference().isEmpty())
768                                continue;
769
770                        Set<String> hgncSymbols = new HashSet<String>();
771                        Set<String> hgncIds = new HashSet<String>();
772
773                        if(ser.getUri().startsWith("http://identifiers.org/hgnc")) {
774                                String s = ser.getUri().substring(ser.getUri().lastIndexOf("/")+1);
775                                if(s.startsWith("HGNC:"))
776                                        hgncIds.add(s);
777                                else
778                                        hgncSymbols.add(s);
779                        }
780
781                        for(Xref x : ser.getXref()) {
782                                if(x instanceof PublicationXref || x.getDb()==null || x.getId()==null)
783                                        continue; //skip
784
785                                if(x.getDb().toLowerCase().startsWith("hgnc") && !x.getId().toLowerCase().startsWith("hgnc:")) {
786                                        hgncSymbols.add(x.getId().toLowerCase());
787                                }
788                                else if(x.getDb().toLowerCase().startsWith("hgnc") && x.getId().toLowerCase().startsWith("hgnc:")) {
789                                        hgncIds.add(x.getId().toLowerCase());
790                                }
791                        }
792
793                        if(hgncIds.size()>1 || hgncSymbols.size()>1)
794                                haveMultipleHgnc.add((SequenceEntityReference) ser);
795
796                        //increment "no hgnc" and "total" counts by data source
797                        for(Object provenance : pa.getValueFromBean(ser)) {
798                                if (hgncSymbols.isEmpty() && hgncIds.isEmpty()) {
799                                        if (verbose) {
800                                                problemErs.add(String.format("%s\t%s\t%s",
801                                                        ((Provenance) provenance).getDisplayName(), ser.getDisplayName(), ser.getUri()));
802                                        }
803
804                                        MutableInt n = numProblematicErs.get(provenance);
805                                        if (n == null)
806                                                numProblematicErs.put((Provenance) provenance, new MutableInt(1));
807                                        else
808                                                n.increment();
809                                }
810
811                                MutableInt tot = numErs.get(provenance);
812                                if (tot == null)
813                                        numErs.put((Provenance) provenance, new MutableInt(1));
814                                else
815                                        tot.increment();
816                        }
817                }
818                //print results
819                if(verbose) {
820                        out.println("SequenceEntityReferences (not generics) without any HGNC Symbol:");
821                        for(String line : problemErs) out.println(line);
822                }
823                out.println("The number of SERs (not generic) having more than one HGNC Symbols: " + haveMultipleHgnc.size());
824                out.println("\nNumber of SequenceEntityReferences (not generics) without any HGNC ID, by data source:");
825                int totalPrs = 0;
826                int numPrsNoHgnc = 0;
827                for(Provenance ds : numProblematicErs.keySet()) {
828                        int n = numProblematicErs.get(ds).intValue();
829                        numPrsNoHgnc += n;
830                        int t = numErs.get(ds).intValue();
831                        totalPrs += t;
832                        out.println(String.format("%s\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", ds.getUri(), n, ((float)n)/t*100));
833                }
834                out.println(String.format("Total\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", numPrsNoHgnc, ((float)numPrsNoHgnc)/totalPrs*100));
835        }
836
837        private static void summarizeUniprotIds(Model model, PrintStream out) {
838                boolean verbose = true; //TODO use another parameter here
839
840                //Analyse PRs - UniProt ID coverage,..
841                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
842                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numProblematicErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
843                PathAccessor pa = new PathAccessor("EntityReference/entityReferenceOf:Protein/dataSource", model.getLevel());
844                Set<String> problemErs = new TreeSet<String>();
845                for(ProteinReference pr : model.getObjects(ProteinReference.class)) {
846                        //skip a generic one
847                        if(!pr.getMemberEntityReference().isEmpty())
848                                continue;
849
850                        for(Object provenance : pa.getValueFromBean(pr)) {
851                                if(!pr.getUri().startsWith("http://identifiers.org/uniprot")
852                                        && !pr.getXref().toString().toLowerCase().contains("uniprot")) {
853
854                                        if (verbose) {
855                                                problemErs.add(String.format("%s\t%s\t%s",
856                                                        ((Provenance) provenance).getDisplayName(), pr.getDisplayName(), pr.getUri()));
857                                        }
858
859                                        MutableInt n = numProblematicErs.get(provenance);
860                                        if (n == null)
861                                                numProblematicErs.put((Provenance) provenance, new MutableInt(1));
862                                        else
863                                                n.increment();
864                                }
865
866                                //increment total PRs per datasource
867                                MutableInt tot = numErs.get(provenance);
868                                if(tot == null)
869                                        numErs.put((Provenance)provenance, new MutableInt(1));
870                                else
871                                        tot.increment();
872                        }
873                }
874
875                //print results
876                if(verbose) {
877                        out.println("\nProteinReferences (not generics) without any UniProt AC:");
878                        for(String line : problemErs) out.println(line);
879                }
880                out.println("\nNumber of ProteinReferences (not generics) without any UniProt AC, by data source:");
881                int totalErs = 0;
882                int problematicErs = 0;
883                for(Provenance ds : numProblematicErs.keySet()) {
884                        int n = numProblematicErs.get(ds).intValue();
885                        problematicErs += n;
886                        int t = numErs.get(ds).intValue();
887                        totalErs += t;
888                        out.println(String.format("%s\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", ds.getUri(), n, ((float)n)/t*100));
889                }
890                out.println(String.format("Total\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", problematicErs, ((float)problematicErs)/totalErs*100));
891        }
892
893        private static void summarizeChebiIds(Model model, PrintStream out) {
894                boolean verbose = true; //TODO use another parameter here
895                //Analyse SMRs - ChEBI usage, coverage,..
896                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
897                Map<Provenance,MutableInt> numProblematicErs = new HashMap<Provenance,MutableInt>();
898                PathAccessor pa = new PathAccessor("EntityReference/entityReferenceOf:SmallMolecule/dataSource", model.getLevel());
899                Set<String> problemErs = new TreeSet<String>();
900                for(SmallMoleculeReference smr : model.getObjects(SmallMoleculeReference.class)) {
901                        //skip a generic SMR
902                        if(!smr.getMemberEntityReference().isEmpty())
903                                continue;
904
905                        for(Object provenance : pa.getValueFromBean(smr)) {
906                                if(!smr.getUri().startsWith("http://identifiers.org/chebi/CHEBI:")
907                                        && !smr.getXref().toString().contains("CHEBI:")) {
908
909                                        if (verbose) {
910                                                problemErs.add(String.format("%s\t%s\t%s",
911                                                        ((Provenance) provenance).getDisplayName(), smr.getDisplayName(), smr.getUri()));
912                                        }
913
914                                        MutableInt n = numProblematicErs.get(provenance);
915                                        if (n == null)
916                                                numProblematicErs.put((Provenance) provenance, new MutableInt(1));
917                                        else
918                                                n.increment();
919                                }
920
921                                //increment total SMRs per datasource
922                                MutableInt tot = numErs.get(provenance);
923                                if(tot == null)
924                                        numErs.put((Provenance)provenance, new MutableInt(1));
925                                else
926                                        tot.increment();
927                        }
928                }
929
930                //print results
931                if(verbose) {
932                        out.println("\nSmallMoleculeReferences (not generics) without any ChEBI ID:");
933                        for(String line : problemErs) out.println(line);
934                }
935                out.println("\nNumber of SmallMoleculeReferences (not generics) without any ChEBI ID, by data source:");
936                int totalSmrs = 0;
937                int numSmrsNoChebi = 0;
938                for(Provenance ds : numProblematicErs.keySet()) {
939                        int n = numProblematicErs.get(ds).intValue();
940                        numSmrsNoChebi += n;
941                        int t = numErs.get(ds).intValue();
942                        totalSmrs += t;
943                        out.println(String.format("%s\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", ds.getUri(), n, ((float)n)/t*100));
944                }
945                out.println(String.format("Total\t\t%d\t(%3.1f%%)", numSmrsNoChebi, ((float)numSmrsNoChebi)/totalSmrs*100));
946        }
947
948        /**
949         * A summary of BioPAX class and property values in the model
950         * (experimental, messy; for data troubleshooting).
951         *
952         * @param model input Model
953         * @param out output file
954         * @throws IOException when an I/O exception occurs
955         */
956        public static void summarize(Model model, PrintStream out) throws IOException {
957                HashMap<String, Integer> hm = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
958
959                final SimpleEditorMap em = SimpleEditorMap.get(model.getLevel());
960
961                for (Class<? extends BioPAXElement> clazz : sortToName(em.getKnownSubClassesOf(BioPAXElement.class)))
962                {
963                        Set<? extends BioPAXElement> set = model.getObjects(clazz);
964                        int initialSize = set.size();
965                        set = filterToExactClass(set, clazz);
966                        String s = clazz.getSimpleName() + " = " + set.size();
967                        if (initialSize != set.size())
968                                s += " (and " + (initialSize - set.size()) + " children)";
969                        out.println(s);
970
971                        Set<PropertyEditor> editors = em.getEditorsOf(clazz);
972                        for (PropertyEditor editor : editors)
973                        {
974                                Method getMethod = editor.getGetMethod();
975                                Class<?> returnType = getMethod.getReturnType();
976
977                                Map<Object, Integer> cnt = new HashMap<Object, Integer>();
978
979                                if (returnType.isEnum() ||
980                                        implementsInterface(returnType, ControlledVocabulary.class))
981                                {
982                                        for (BioPAXElement ele : set)
983                                        {
984                                                Set<?> values = editor.getValueFromBean(ele);
985                                                if (values.isEmpty())
986                                                {
987                                                        increaseCnt(cnt, NULL);
988                                                }
989                                                else
990                                                {
991                                                        increaseCnt(cnt, values.iterator().next());
992                                                }
993                                        }
994                                }
995                                else if (returnType.equals(Set.class) &&
996                                        implementsInterface(editor.getRange(), ControlledVocabulary.class))
997                                {
998                                        for (BioPAXElement ele : set)
999                                        {
1000                                                Set<?> values = editor.getValueFromBean(ele);
1001                                                if (values.isEmpty())
1002                                                {
1003                                                        increaseCnt(cnt, EMPTY);
1004                                                }
1005                                                for (Object val : values)
1006                                                {
1007                                                        increaseCnt(cnt, val);
1008                                                }
1009                                        }
1010                                }
1011
1012                                if (!cnt.isEmpty())
1013                                {
1014                                        String name = "-"
1015                                                + (returnType.equals(Set.class) ? editor.getRange().getSimpleName() : returnType.getSimpleName());
1016
1017                                        out.print("\t" + name + ":");
1018                                        for (Object key : getOrdering(cnt))
1019                                        {
1020                                                out.print("\t" + key + " = " + cnt.get(key));
1021                                        }
1022                                        out.println();
1023                                }
1024                        }
1025                }
1026
1027                out.println("\nOther property counts\n");
1028                String[] props = (model.getLevel() == BioPAXLevel.L3)
1029                        ? new String[]{"UnificationXref/db","RelationshipXref/db"}
1030                        : new String[]{"unificationXref/DB","relationshipXref/DB"};
1031                for (String prop : props)
1032                {
1033                        Map<Object, Integer> cnt = new HashMap<Object, Integer>();
1034                        List<String> valList = new ArrayList<String>();
1035                        PathAccessor acc = new PathAccessor(prop, model.getLevel());
1036
1037                        boolean isString = false;
1038
1039                        for (Object o : acc.getValueFromModel(model))
1040                        {
1041                                if (o instanceof String) isString = true;
1042
1043                                String s = o.toString();
1044                                valList.add(s);
1045                                if (!cnt.containsKey(s)) cnt.put(s, 1);
1046                                else cnt.put(s, cnt.get(s) + 1);
1047                        }
1048
1049                        out.println(prop + "\t(" + cnt.size() + " distinct values):");
1050                        hm.put(prop, cnt.size());
1051
1052                        // If the object is String, then all counts are 1, no need to print counts.
1053                        if (isString)
1054                        {
1055                                Collections.sort(valList);
1056                                for (String s : valList)
1057                                {
1058                                        out.print("\t" + s);
1059                                }
1060                        }
1061                        else
1062                        {
1063                                for (Object key : getOrdering(cnt))
1064                                {
1065                                        out.print("\t" + key + " = " + cnt.get(key));
1066                                }
1067                        }
1068                        out.println();
1069                }
1070
1071                //Count simple PEs that have null entityReference
1072                int speLackingEr = 0;
1073                int genericSpeLackingEr = 0;
1074                int speLackingErAndId = 0;
1075                int protLackingErAndId = 0;
1076                int molLackingErAndId = 0;
1077                int naLackingErAndId = 0; //rem: na - nucleic acid
1078                //a map that contains the no. SPEs that have null entityReference by data source
1079                Map<String,Integer> numSpeLackErByProvider = new TreeMap<String, Integer>();
1080                for(SimplePhysicalEntity spe : model.getObjects(SimplePhysicalEntity.class)) {
1081                        if(spe.getEntityReference()==null) {
1082                                speLackingEr++;
1083                                if(!spe.getMemberPhysicalEntity().isEmpty())
1084                                        genericSpeLackingEr++;
1085
1086                                String providers = spe.getDataSource().toString();
1087                                Integer n = numSpeLackErByProvider.get(providers);
1088                                n = (n==null) ? 1 : n + 1;
1089                                numSpeLackErByProvider.put(providers, n);
1090
1091                                if(spe.getXref().isEmpty() ||
1092                                        new ClassFilterSet<Xref,PublicationXref>(spe.getXref(), PublicationXref.class)
1093                                                .size() == spe.getXref().size())
1094                                {
1095                                        speLackingErAndId++;
1096                                        if(spe instanceof Protein)
1097                                                protLackingErAndId++;
1098                                        else if(spe instanceof SmallMolecule)
1099                                                molLackingErAndId++;
1100                                        else if(spe instanceof NucleicAcid)
1101                                                naLackingErAndId++;
1102                                }
1103                        }
1104                }
1105
1106                out.println("\n" + speLackingEr + " simple physical entities have NULL 'entityReference';\n");
1107                out.println("\n\t-" + genericSpeLackingEr + " of which have member physical entities (are generic).\n");
1108                out.println("\n\t- by data source:\n");
1109                for(String key : numSpeLackErByProvider.keySet()) {
1110                        out.println(String.format("\n\t\t-- %s -> %d\n", key, numSpeLackErByProvider.get(key)));
1111                }
1112                out.println("\n\t- " + speLackingErAndId + " neither have 'entityReference' nor xref/id (except publications):\n");
1113                if(speLackingErAndId > 0) {
1114                        out.println("\n\t\t-- proteins: " + protLackingErAndId + "\n");
1115                        out.println("\n\t\t-- small molecules: " + molLackingErAndId + "\n");
1116                        out.println("\n\t\t-- nucl. acids: " + naLackingErAndId + "\n");
1117                }
1118
1119                int erLackingId = 0;
1120                for(EntityReference er : model.getObjects(EntityReference.class)) {
1121                        if(er.getMemberEntityReference().isEmpty() &&
1122                                (er.getXref().isEmpty() || new ClassFilterSet<Xref,PublicationXref>(er.getXref(), PublicationXref.class)
1123                                        .size() == er.getXref().size()))
1124                        {
1125                                erLackingId++;
1126                        }
1127                }
1128                out.println("\n" + erLackingId + " non-generic entity references have no xref/id.\n");
1129
1130                //The number of sequence ERs (not generic), Genes, Pathways, where 'organism' property is empty -
1131                int genesLackingOrganism = 0;
1132                int pwLackingOrganism = 0;
1133                int serLackingOrganism = 0;
1134                int narLackingOrganism = 0;
1135                for(BioPAXElement bpe : model.getObjects()) {
1136                        if(bpe instanceof Gene && ((Gene) bpe).getOrganism()==null)
1137                                ++genesLackingOrganism;
1138                        else if(bpe instanceof Pathway && ((Pathway) bpe).getOrganism()==null)
1139                                ++pwLackingOrganism;
1140                        else if(bpe instanceof SequenceEntityReference && ((SequenceEntityReference)bpe).getOrganism() == null) {
1141                                ++serLackingOrganism;
1142                                if(bpe instanceof NucleicAcidReference)
1143                                        ++narLackingOrganism;
1144                        }
1145                }
1146                out.println(
1147                        String.format(
1148                                "\n%d Genes, %d Pathways, %d SequenceEntityReferences " +
1149                                        "(%d in NucleicAcidRef. and %d in PRs) have NULL 'organism'.\n",
1150                                genesLackingOrganism, pwLackingOrganism, serLackingOrganism,
1151                                narLackingOrganism, serLackingOrganism-narLackingOrganism
1152                        )
1153                );
1154        }
1155
1156        private static List<Class<? extends BioPAXElement>> sortToName(
1157                Set<? extends Class<? extends BioPAXElement>> classes)
1158        {
1159                List<Class<? extends BioPAXElement>> list = new ArrayList<Class<? extends BioPAXElement>>(classes);
1160                Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<Class<? extends  BioPAXElement>>() {
1161                        public int compare(Class<? extends BioPAXElement> clazz1, Class<? extends BioPAXElement> clazz2)
1162                        {
1163                                return clazz1.getName().substring(clazz1.getName().lastIndexOf(".")+1).compareTo(
1164                                        clazz2.getName().substring(clazz2.getName().lastIndexOf(".")+1));
1165                        }
1166                });
1167
1168                return list;
1169        }
1170
1171        private static List<Object> getOrdering(final Map<Object, Integer> map) {
1172                List<Object> list = new ArrayList<Object>(map.keySet());
1173                Collections.sort(list, new Comparator<Object>()
1174                {
1175                        public int compare(Object key1, Object key2)
1176                        {
1177                                int cnt1 = map.get(key1);
1178                                int cnt2 = map.get(key2);
1179
1180                                if (cnt1 == cnt2) return key1.toString().compareTo(key2.toString());
1181                                else return cnt2 - cnt1;
1182                        }
1183                });
1184
1185                return list;
1186        }
1187
1188        private static Set<BioPAXElement> filterToExactClass(Set<? extends BioPAXElement> classSet, Class<?> clazz)
1189        {
1190                Set<BioPAXElement> exact = new HashSet<BioPAXElement>();
1191                for (BioPAXElement ele : classSet) {
1192                        if (ele.getModelInterface().equals(clazz)) exact.add(ele);
1193                }
1194
1195                return exact;
1196        }
1197
1198        private static final Object NULL = new Object(){
1199                @Override
1200                public String toString()
1201                {
1202                        return "NULL";
1203                }
1204        };
1205
1206        private static final Object EMPTY = new Object(){
1207                @Override
1208                public String toString()
1209                {
1210                        return "EMPTY";
1211                }
1212        };
1213
1214        private static boolean implementsInterface(Class clazz, Class inter) {
1215                for (Class anInter : clazz.getInterfaces()) {
1216                        if (anInter.equals(inter))
1217                                return true;
1218                }
1219
1220                return false;
1221        }
1222
1223        private static void increaseCnt(Map<Object, Integer> cnt, Object key) {
1224                if (!cnt.containsKey(key))
1225                        cnt.put(key, 0);
1226                cnt.put(key, cnt.get(key) + 1);
1227        }
1228
1229        // gets new IS - either FIS or GzipIS if .gz extension present
1230        private static InputStream getInputStream(String path) throws IOException {
1231                InputStream is = new FileInputStream(path);
1232                return (path.endsWith(".gz")) ? new GZIPInputStream(is) : is ;
1233        }
1234
1235}
